tool.name: DANTE_LTR transposamble elements filtering
tool.command: Rscript ${__tool_directory__}/clean_ltr.R --gff3 '$dante_ltr' --reference_sequence '$reference' --output output --cpu 32 && mv output_clean.gff3 $dante_ltr_clean && mv output_RM_lib.fasta $rm_lib

data.name: dante_ltr_clean
data.label: Annotation of validated LTR transposable elements based on annotation $dante_ltr.hid and reference $reference.hid

data.name: rm_lib
data.label: Non-redundant library of LTR transposable elements based on annotation $dante_ltr.hid and reference $reference.hid

tool.help: This tool takes output from DANTE_LTR search identifies good quality transposable elements. Good quality TE are considered those which does not have any cross-similarity between distinct lineages. Output from this tool is a annotation in GFF3 format and non-redundant library of elements for custom RepeatMasker search.
